EmailTemplate.name: Access Revoke Expiry Notification Reminder
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello Manager($!manager), General Temporary Access You are receiving this email because your direct was approved for temporary access that is set to revoke on ($!endDate). List of access Entitlements and Roles to be revoked;

• $!entitlement

• $!role

If they need this access to be extended, please follow the steps listed in the job aid. Note: Privacy Suppression Assessment(PSA) PSA extensions in ServiceNow do not automatically extend access to the users under a PSA in All Access, Those Users will need to submit a request with the PSA# in the business justification to retain their access within All Access. Resources: Slack Channels For All Access Support, go to: #all-access For PSA extension questions or support, go to: #psa-support Additional All Access Resources: All Access Pulse Page

Argument.name: manager
Argument.Description: The Identity of the original request to sunset the role or entitlement

Argument.name: requestee
Argument.Description: The Identity that the role or entitlement belongs to

Argument.name: endDate
Argument.Description: The date that the role or entitlement will be removed on

EmailTemplate.Subject: Temporary Access Revoke Notification
